refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays memory maps for debugging purposes.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Displays memory maps for debugging purposes.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the memprint command to list memory maps for debugging.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
